title: A “Patriot” Fake and Gay
author: VD
content_html:
It’s always important to pay close attention to self-applied appellations. It turns out what is “misfit” about the Misfit Patriot is that he’s not a pro-American patriot at all.

I’ve come to the realization that I’m actually not America First, and heres why:

Im not a fan of people who think Jews/Israel can do no wrong, and it’s very clear I absolutely fuckin detest people who think the Jews/Israel are responsible for everything wrong with the world.

However, the people I hate more than both groups are fucking liars who tell you they don’t hate Jews/Israel, they’re “just asking questions” or “they don’t like what the government is doing”

Bullshit! It’s the Jews.

I couldn’t give a fuck about the Israeli government, and I’ve said that about 1000 times, yet whenever I support taking out terrorists, or standing up for Jews (not the Israeli government), I get accused of being a shill for a country that I know very little about. The Nation state of Israel is no different to me than Canada. It’s a country, and it’s not my country.

The only thing I put before my country is God, period!

I know Jesus, and I know the Father. Jesus was a Jew, and the Father told me to Bless the people of Israel, and I can guarantee you he wasn’t talking about the ones who chant Allahu Akbar. If you think I’m gonna turn my back on my creator because you don’t like our current foreign policy, you clearly don’t understand my conviction on this matter.

So to all the people who claim because I stand with the Jews I’m not “America first”, you’re right. I’m God first, and America second. The nation state of Israel doesn’t even make the top 10, but the people who live there (Gods chosen people) are more important to me than any of your partisan geopolitical bullshit.

I know this won’t make any difference to replacement theology retards or chatGPT Christians, but to anyone who actually understands what’s written in the Bible, it will light a fire under their ass and remind them we are not, fucking, backing, down.

So come at me, fucker. I got the protection of the almighty on my side. Genesis 12:1-3

Let’s see. This self-styled “patriot” is allegedly a) America-second, b) an ethnic Jew, and c) gay, if the information in the comments is correct. He’s definitely part of the problem, not part of the solution.

As for his talk about “God”, it’s pretty clear that this guy’s god is the god of this world and he’s a philosatanic judeo-churchian. As for Genesis 12:1-3, I will counter with Revelation 2:8–9.

God never said one single word about “blessing the Jews”. And He certainly didn’t say anything about “blessing the Synagogue of Satan”.

Why do conservatives pay these charlatans any attention whatsoever?

DISCUSS ON SG

DISCUSS ON SG
